titleStmt.title: A most true relation of the attachment, life, death, and confession of Will. Waller alias Walker, Ward, or Slater, a priest and jesuite, which was hang'd, drawne and quartered at Ty burne, on Munday being the 26 day of Iuly, anno Dom. 1641. ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
